item.description:
Hi all,

I have heard this band is a blow-out awesome rock band playing all kinds of stuff!

The band is called "Over 6".

It is only a $6 cover charge (at the door).

The owner is offering us all free appetizers too! (All he asks is that we each eat or drink $10 worth and we'll all get the round of free appetizers.)

It is Middle Eastern Food and actually really good and authentic. So he said like free chicken fingers, taboli, fries, etc., so I think that's a good deal for us.

The band does not actually start till 9:00 so we meet there at 8:00.

I have a couple other Meet Up groups coming. There will be more than just this group.

Feel free to bring along friends and family!

Greg
item.name: Dinner + New England's Largest Cover Band!!
